testCases.label: Retrieve all pets of a specific species
testCases.description: Verifies that retrieving pets by species returns the correct pets and excludes pets of other species.

testCases.label: Retrieve pets by name or age
testCases.description: Verifies that retrieving pets by name or age returns the correct set of pets matching either condition.

testCases.label: Calculate average age of all pets
testCases.description: Verifies that the method correctly calculates the average age of all pets in the repository.
